name: visual-db
features: Database visualization: Display table relationships and schema structure in interactive diagrams for better understanding.
Query builder: Construct SQL queries visually by selecting tables, columns, and conditions without writing code.
Data browsing: View and edit table contents through a spreadsheet-like interface with sorting and filtering.
Schema management: Create, modify, and delete tables and columns using visual tools instead of SQL commands.
Relationship mapping: Define foreign keys and view connections between tables with automatic diagram updates.
Multi-database support: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, and other databases from a single unified interface.
Export options: Generate SQL scripts or export data to CSV for backup and migration purposes.
Team collaboration: Share database diagrams and queries with team members for coordinated development work.
